preview_text: Theres a lot of missing animations and VFX that need to be finished
The buggiest POS I've ever made...but when it works, its game changing
The Legendary Son of Sparda from DMC5 playing as Drunk Homeless Man from League of Legends

entry.entry_body: <video controls class='basic-video-style m-y-5 m-x-a text-center w-50'><source src='/videos/large/DMC5-Vergil-as-Yasuo.webm' type='video/webm'></video>

2.0 Update is LIVE!

NEW NEW NEWWWW!!!!
I FIXED YASUO'S HUNCHED BACK!! VERGIL HAS BEEN CURED!

Mod info

For BASE SKIN Yasuo only. Will not work with other skins!

Description

For when you're literally the story that is approaching. I PROMISE you, you'll be a better Yasuo player with this mod. IDK why.

Credits

The assets were sourced by CAPCOM's DMC5 video game! All rights go to their respective owners. I do not claim to own any of the work/assets used by the mod.I do claim ownership of the effort put behind the formation of the mod itself.

Bugs

None so far! Join the discord to report any problems you have with the mod!

How to contribute

ALL OF MY MODS ARE FREE TO MODIFY IN EXCHANGE FOR CREDIT! Send me a DM and I'll give you whatever file you need to get started, including the link to the repo! Just please, credit me, and all parties that deserve credit! I LOVE CLOUT. RAAAAAAAAAHHHH

Mod rank

You went out of your way to look at my mod(s), and I couldn't be more grateful to you.What are weights???The model was given rough-weightsThe model has 0.5 weights on major joints, like arms and legsThe model was 100% weighted by meThis uses weights from the original source model
Model/WeightingX
I make these mods for you all, and I am fueled by the wonderful praise I received from each of you.I made them ðŸ˜­Riot Gamesâ„¢ made them ðŸ˜”Some animations were replaced utilizing various techniquesAnimations were created by source animations mirroring to the rigAnimations were imported by the source
AnimationsX
With each praise, I go back and make my mods better. You keep my mods alive and well, my life's work.I made them ðŸ˜­UntouchedSome voice lines were changedAll the voice lines were changedBoth voice lines and SFX were changed
SFX and voice linesX
Because of you are who you are, I can keep going. And I hope to see you again.I made them ðŸ˜­UntouchedCreated by a professional
Ability IconsX
You are priceless to me.
With love,
Valentine		UntouchedColor-shiftedAdjusted/Trimmed/TweakedCustom VFX
VFX/ParticlesX
This mod is considered:

version_history.patch_note: Fixed bug with squares/missing assets on Flying Judgement Cut
Updated healthbar to fix font size
Fixed squares that would appear on tornado
Had a really awesome particle effect for Vergil, but the inconsistency of cslol/ritobin prevented me from using it
Consolidated similar mods into single folder;Updated skin animations to match DMC5 vergil anims
Fixed vfx flying away from Yasuo
Fixed frozen animations that Vergil would do after joke

preview_text: The Doppelganger clone as Yasuo. Works well with Vergil as Yone

preview_text: The deadweight himself as my feeding support! I had daydreams of Nero being Blitzcrank, and I finally got around to making it
The other Legendary Son of Sparda from DCM5 playing as Dante-wannabe from League of Legends
This skin replaces Riven from League of Legends to Dante from DMC5. This mod was originally made for a friend, and as suck, gets to have a custom message written onto the loading screen image.
My gf asked for this skin for MONTHS. And when I finally get around to making it, she still uses the winterblessed skin. ðŸ˜­
Replaces Yone as DMC5 Vergil. Works really well with DMC5 Doppelganger as Yasuo. (I do not condone the behavior of windshitters bot. Lose LP at your own discretion)
I REALLY hated listening to Annoying Disney Character (ADC)(Smolder) speak. So I rushed this mod as quick as possible. Works really well with DMC5 V as Hwei.
Gwen but shes in permanent doll mode. Extremely adorable and demoralizing to lose against
This skin mod replaces Hecarim from League of Legends with Berial from DMC4. This mod was requested and dedicated for Pinhetro
The strongest jujutsu sorcerer is now the ruler of the Death Realm in Runeterra
This skin mod replaces Skarner from League of Legends with Nobody from DMC5. This mod was requested and dedicated for Cuestionmark
The paint ninja from Naruto as the paint boy from League of Legends
This skin mod replaces Sett from League of Legends with Goku from Dragon Ball. This mod was requested and dedicated for UltraXEgo
The Prince of Boogie Woogie is tearing up the Rift with my highest quality weighted model yet!
